text: avara paiki pakva jnanavullavaru hagu visvasigalu matra, nimage ilisikodalagiruvudaralli (kur‌an‌nalli) mattu nimaginta hinde ilisikodalagiddaralli (divya sandesadalli) nambike iduttare. Namajh annu palisuttare, jhakat annu pavatisuttare mattu allahanalli hagu paralokadalli nambike ittiruttare. Avarige navu bhavya pratiphala nidaliddeve
